channel.title: Pivot Tables in GridDesktop on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Pivot Tables in GridDesktop on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Render PivotTable in GridDesktop
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Render PivotTable in GridDesktop 3 Sample Code | Possible Usage Scenarios If your Excel file has a Pivot Table, GridDesktop will be able to load and render the Pivot Table fine. Besides, you will be able to interact the Pivot Table in GUI and manipulate it. Render PivotTable in GridDesktop The following sample code imports the Sample Excel File containing the Pivot Table.
